parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A number, total. From airo; a number.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To seal, set a seal upon. From sphragis; to stamp for security or preservation; by implication, to keep secret, to attest.
One hundred. Of uncertain affinity; a hundred.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A tribe or race of people. From phuo; an offshoot, i.e. Race or clan.
Of Hebrew origin; Israel, the adopted name of Jacob, including his descendants.
